# polaris_workloads (Data Source)

The `polaris_workloads` data source is used to access information about the
valid workload hierarchy types (snappable types) that can be used in the RSC account.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) SHA-256 hash of the workloads.
- `workloads` (List of String) Valid workload hierarchy types (snappable types) that can be used in the RSC account.
